snippet: Vodafone and the Indian government are heading toward a legal fight over taxes stemming from a $11 billion acquisition in 2007. An investment treaty between India and the Netherlands signed in 1995 may play a crucial role in the dispute. The India...
abstract: Vodafone and the Indian government are heading toward a legal fight over taxes stemming from a $11 billion acquisition in 2007. An investment treaty between India and the Netherlands signed in 1995 may play a crucial role in the dispute. The India Ink blog explains.

headline.main: The Treaty That May Decide Vodafone Tax Case
